DOC.brief_title: A Study Vantictumab ( OMP-18R5 ) Combination With Docetaxel Patients With Previously Treated NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: Once maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) maximum administer dose ( MAD ) determine , 10 patient may enrol cohort-expansion phase well characterize safety , tolerability PK vantictumab combine docetaxel . Up approximately 34 patient may enrol study .
